column1: https://newspunch.com/hillary-clinton-blames-russia-fbi-for-election-loss//Hillary Clinton Blames Russia & FBI For Election Loss/"Hillary Clinton is blaming Russia and the FBI for her election defeat.
Addressing her top donors at a party Thursday night at New York’s Plaza hotel
column2: Clinton blamed suspected Russian hacking and the email scandal case raised by the Federal Bureau of Investigation for her loss in the 2016 US presidential election.

column1: She also said that Russian President Vladimir Putin meddled in the US election process because he had ‘”personal beef” against her.
Press TV reports:
The former US secretary of state made the comments in a meeting with her Democratic campaign donors in New York on Thursday
column2: describing the release of a letter from FBI Director James Comey as regards potential mishandling of classified materials and Russian cyber attacks as two important factors in her loss to US President-elect Donald Trump.

column1: “Swing-state voters made their decisions in the final days breaking against me because of the FBI letter from Director Comey
column2: ” Clinton said.

column1: She argued that the release of those documents just eleven days before the November 8 election focused negative attention onto her campaign at a crucial time when voters were in doubt who to support.

The former presidential candidate also pointed out to an assessment report by the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) that the Russian administration was directly involved in cyber attacks designed to influence the last month’s US election.
“This is not just an attack on me and my campaign
column2: although that may have added fuel to it. This is an attack against our country. We are well beyond normal political concerns here. This is about the integrity of our democracy and the security of our nation
column3: ” Clinton said.

column1: During the meeting with her top donors
column2: Clinton said that Russian President Vladimir Putin meddled in the US election process out of a ‘”personal beef” against her
column3: referring to the year 2011
column4: when then US secretary of state publicly challenged the integrity of the Russian parliamentary elections
column5: and reportedly attempted to incite street protests against the government of Putin.

column1: The American officials claimed that the Russian leader has never forgiven Clinton over these anti-Russian moves.
“Putin publicly blamed me for the outpouring of outrage by his own people
column2: and that is the direct line between what he said back then and what he did in this election
column3: ” Clinton said.

column1: On November 8
column2: Republican nominee Donald Trump stunned the political world and won the US presidency despite extreme unpopularity among minorities with 306 votes in the Electoral College
column3: 36 more than he required to win the White House.

column1: His Democratic rival
column2: however
column3: won the national popular vote by more than two million ballots in the November election.

column1: Large protests have erupted nationwide in response to Trump’s election victory following a contentious presidential campaign involving two of the least popular major-party candidates in recent US history."/['Niamh Harris']/2016-12-16 20:39:27+00:00/"https://cdn.newspunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/hillary-clinton.jpg.optimal.jpg"

https://newspunch.com/study-processed-food-causes-same-addiction-as-hard-drugs//Study: Processed Food Causes Same Addiction As Hard Drugs/"A study by the University of Michigan proves what alternative health researchers have known all along – that highly processed foods are as addictive
column2: if not more so
column3: than hard drugs.

column1: In Andrew Weil’s 1970’s book
column2: ‘The Natural Mind’
column3: he asserts that refined sugar triggers addictive behaviour in humans that mimic the behaviour of cocaine addicts.

column1: Now in 2015 (over 40 years since the publication of that book) this new study says that “cheese really is crack“
column2: and as the Los Angeles Times reported:

column1: Pizza
column2: unsurprisingly
column3: came out on top of the most addictive food list. Besides being a basic food group for kids
column4: college students and adults
column5: there’s a scientific reason we all love pizza
column6: and it has to do with the cheese.

column1: Naturalnews.com reports:
The study found certain foods are addictive because of the way they are processed. The more processed and fatty the food
column2: the more it was associated with addictive eating behaviors.

column1: Even if you have never heard of Weil or this new study
column2: you are likely already familiar with the addictive properties of food
column3: especially gooey
column4: fat
column5: delicious cheese such as that found on top of pizzas
column6: right? If not
column7: perhaps you’re a soda pop junkie instead? We already know that the worst foods are the most addictive ones. It doesn’t take a fancy scientific study to tell us that.

column1: Nevertheless
column2: the findings are interesting. At least we now have somewhat of an excuse for obsessively stuffing our faces with Oreos
column3: camembert or whatever our fix happens to be.

column1: The conclusion of the report states:
The current study provides preliminary evidence that not all foods are equally implicated in addictive-like eating behavior
column2: and highly processed foods
column3: which may share characteristics with drugs of abuse (e.g. high dose
column4: rapid rate of absorption) appear to be particularly associated with ‘food addiction.’

column1: In other words
column2: the highly processed foods work on our bodies in similar ways that addictive hard drugs do: they are absorbed into our bloodstreams quickly and in high doses
column3: but do they actually give us a “rush” or a “high” similar to hard drugs?"/['Sean Adl-Tabatabai']/2015-11-02 20:18:26+00:00/"https://cdn.newspunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/food-addict-drug-addcit.jpg.optimal.jpg"

column1: https://newspunch.com/soros-funded-group-donation-prosecutor-who-dropped-jussie-smollett-charges//Soros-Funded Group Gave Massive Donation to Prosecutor Who Dropped Jussie Smollett Charges/"Far-left billionaire George Soros gave seven-figure campaign donations to re-elect Kim Foxx
column2: the corrupt Chicago prosecutor who mysteriously dropped all charges against hate hoaxer Jussie Smollett.

column1: Foxx is running to return to her office as state’s attorney for Cook County
column2: and it’s reported that she was aided by a political pac named the Illinois Justice & Public Safety PAC which helped her run a six-figure ad campaign.

column1: The pac’s entire $2 million budget came from one of the many activist groups funded by Soros
column2: according to the Washington Free Beacon.

column1: Breitbart.com reports: The Soros funding came as part of the billionaire’s effort to put radical leftists into county attorney and prosecutor offices all across the country. And Foxx has been part of the Soros plan for years
column2: already. She received $408
column3: 000 from the foreign billionaire when she first ran for her office in 2016.

column1: Foxx was widely criticized for her controversial decision to drop charges of lying about a hate crime lodged against TV actor Jussie Smollett despite that the Chicago Police and a grand jury recommended that he be prosecuted. Even the city’s left-wing mayor vowed to hold the actor accountable for his actions.

Readers may recall last January when Smollett claimed that he was beaten by two white racists in MAGA hats who poured bleach on him and hung a noose around his neck after he left a Subway restaurant in downtown Chicago during a freezing cold morning.

It was not long before the Chicago Police Dept. gathered enough evidence to show that the former Empire star was lying about the attack. Police collected evidence they say showed that Smollett had conspired with two brothers
column2: Abel and Ola Osundairo
column3: to buy all the supplies used in the “attack
column4: ” that he paid them thousands of dollars
column5: and that he likely invented the whole story to get publicity.

Donald Sussman
column2: a billionaire hedge fund manager and major Democratic donor
column3: has given $100
column4: 000 to Foxx’s campaign. Fred Eychaner
column5: chairman of Newsweb Corporation
column6: has provided $600
column7: 000. Michael Sacks
column8: CEO of the Chicago-based Grosvenor Capital Management
column11: the SEIU
column13: a committee run by Black Lives Matter activist Shaun King
column14: each sent hefty donations to Foxx’s campaign.

https://newspunch.com/selfie-destroys-statue-of-legendary-portuguese-king//Selfie Destroys Statue Of Legendary Portuguese King/"A young man has accidentally destroyed the statue of Dom Sebastiao in Lisbon.
The 24-year-old climbed a facade to snap a selfie with the 16th century Portuguese crusader king when the statue became loose causing it to fall to the ground and shatter.
New York Post reports:
The man
column2: whom police did not identify
column3: accidentally toppled Dom Sebastiao’s statue after climbing up to its pedestal outside the ornate Rossio railway station in central Lisbon just before midnight on Tuesday.

column1: He tried to flee the scene but police caught him. He will appear before a judge at a later date.
The child-sized statue of the sad-eyed
column2: sword-wielding king stood in a niche between two horseshoe-shaped arches at the entrance to the station. Completed in 1890
column3: the station is a protected monument.

column1: Dom Sebastiao
column2: who ruled between 1557 and 1578
column3: is a tragic figure in Portuguese history
column4: dying in battle at the age of 24 during a crusade of his own making in Morocco.

column1: His body was never properly identified
column2: giving rise to a legend that the king would one day return to claim his throne and save Portugal in times of trouble."/['Edmondo Burr']/2016-05-09 13:05:26+00:00/"https://cdn.newspunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Ternyata-Kota-.jpg.optimal.jpg"

column1: https://newspunch.com/apocalypse-friday-black-moon-event-heralds-end-of-days//Apocalypse Friday: Black Moon Event Heralds End Of Days/"According to some Christian beliefs
column2: a rare Black Moon event occurring Friday night in the Western Hemisphere
column3: heralds the End of Days and the second coming of Jesus Christ to earth.

column1: Doomsday fear mongers insist that Friday’s event is not just another natural astronomical event….
The Inquisitr reports:
According to the predictions of doom by end-time preachers
column2: the Black Moon event on Friday
column3: September 30
column4: will bring about the apocalypse and global destruction.

column1: But according to the astronomy website Accuweather
column2: a Black Moon refers to the second new moon in a calendar month. It is a natural but rare lunar astronomical event that occurred last in March 2014 and occurs once every two and a half years or approximately 32 months.

column1: In contrast
column2: the term Blue Moon refers to the second full Moon in a calendar month.

column1: During a Black Moon event
column2: the Earth’s only natural satellite is completely invisible in the sky because the side facing the Earth is obscured completely in the shadows
column3: away from sunlight.

column1: But in the case of a Blue Moon
column2: the side facing the Earth is bathed in light from the Sun.

column1: However
column2: doomsday fear mongers insist that Friday’s event is not just another natural astronomical event
column3: as scientists think
column4: but an event predicted by Jesus in the New Testament scriptures as a sign of the end of the world that comes after the fulfillment of the “ring of fire eclipse” prophecy that the Sun will go dark.

column1: The website Signs of the End Times quotes the Gospel of Matthew 24:29.
“Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened and the moon shall not give her light
column2: and the stars shall fall from heaven
column3: and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken.”

column1: The Gospel of Luke 21: 25-26 also talks about ominous signs in the heavens before the second coming of Jesus.
“And there shall be signs in the sun
column2: and in the moon
column3: and in the stars; and upon the earth distress of nations
column4: with perplexity; the sea and the waves roaring; Men’s hearts failing them for fear
column5: and looking after those things which are coming on the earth.”

column1: According to conspiracy theorists
column2: the first part of the Matthew prophecy that says the “Sun will be darkened
column3: ” was fulfilled on September 1
column5: when the “ring of fire” solar eclipse occurred.

column1: The “ring of fire” solar eclipse
column2: which caused the Sun to be darkened over Africa
column3: was caused by the Moon blocking sunlight from reaching the Earth.

column1: The second part of the Matthew prophecy
column2: which says that the “Moon shall not give her light
column3: ” will be fulfilled on Friday when the Black Moon event occurs
column4: conspiracy theorists claim.

column1: Conspiracy theorists also quote Acts 2:20.
“The sun will be turned to darkness and the moon to blood before the coming of the great and glorious day of the Lord.”
The first part of the Book of Acts prophecy that says the “Sun will be turned to darkness
column2: ” according to doomsday conspiracy theorists
column3: was fulfilled on September 1
column5: while the second part of the prophecy that says the Moon will be turned to blood was fulfilled earlier in 2015.

column1: The Inquisitr reported in April
column3: that Christian conspiracy theorists
column4: led by prominent and influential end-time preachers
column5: such as Pastor Mark Blitz of El Shaddai Ministry in Tacoma
column6: Washington
column7: and Pastor John Hagee of Cornerstone Church in San Antonio
column8: Texas
column9: warned that the total blood moon lunar eclipse that occurred on April 4
column11: and another that occurred on September 28
column12: were the third and fourth respectively of a series of successive total blood moon lunar eclipses (the Tetrad) that fulfilled biblical prophecies about the Moon turning to blood before the apocalypse at Jesus’s second coming.

column1: Now
column2: according to conspiracy theorists
column3: the Black Moon prophecy will be fulfilled on Friday and would lead to the end of the world as predicted in Matthew 24:29.

column1: “Those signs are letting us know that Jesus is soon coming
column2: ” a conspiracy theorist wrote on Facebook
column3: according to Express. “We are approaching the end of our world and the end of life on Earth for all human beings. Every day
column4: we have to come closer to our savior Jesus Christ. For none can escape for what is coming for the Earth.”

column1: While doomsday preachers are busy spreading fear and panic
column2: scientists have assured that Friday’s Black Moon will not cause the end of the world.

column1: The Black Moon will occur at 8:11 p.m. EDT (5:11 p.m. Pacific Time) on September 30. It will occur in all parts of the U.S and South America
column2: but only in parts of Western Europe and Western Africa.

column1: It will not occur in the Eastern Hemisphere on Friday. But people living in the Eastern Hemisphere will have a chance to experience the Black Moon at the end of the October
column2: around Halloween.

column1: A Black Moon around Halloween is auspicious because in some Pagan traditions
column2: such as in Wicca
column3: it is the time for special rituals and magical spells.

column1: The next Black Moon in the Western Hemisphere will occur in July 2019.
A less common use of the term Black Moon is about a situation that occurs only in February where there are no new moons in a month.

This is even rarer since it occurs only once every five to 10 years."/['Edmondo Burr']/2016-09-28 13:11:39+00:00/"https://cdn.newspunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/SMAK-6ca863ilolbyaipl99hb7aaoobhve6wv8qlxdkcuyca.jpg.optimal.jpg"

column14: the government of God
column16: respect or obey the government of man. The feeling of reverence for parents
column17: and for men in authority above us
column21: is an emanation of the religious sentiment – part and parcel of religion itself.

column1: The healthy mind rises in its feeling of reverence from parents to officials
column2: from common officials to presidents and kings. But it cannot stop here; it seeks a cause for and author of this earthly series of subordinations
column3: which secures to us all the blessings of life
column4: and without which the world would be a pandemonium
column5: and finds it only in the God of Heaven.

column1: The infidel
column2: whose diseased mind does not thus rise “from nature up to Nature’s God
column3: ” turns back upon society
column4: asserts that all men are equal
column5: disputes all human authority
column6: and invokes anarchy and moral chaos. This is no fancy sketch – every page of history attests to its truth. Greece turned infidel in her higher ranks
column7: became anarchical and feeble
column8: and fell an easy prey to Alexander; Rome spurned and contemned her God
column10: and found a race of cruel Caesars to avenge the cause of her slighted divinities. Bonaparte did for infidel
column11: anarchical France what the Caesars had done for Rome.

column1: Look at the North
column2: where infidelity is talked in the streets
column3: is daily diffused from a hundred presses
column4: is heard in the lecture room and from the rostrum
column5: and
column6: worst of all
column7: is preached on every Sabbath from her pulpits
column8: and see how demoralized and feeble and poverty-stricken she has become! Not one human right is secure. The brutal mob reigns supreme; and for want of a Caesar or a Bonaparte good men
column11: men of property
column12: would invest a monkey with the purple to escape the rule of the mob. Aye! and make a good bargain
column13: too
column14: for any form of despotism is preferable to anarchy. We respect
column16: that they who believe not in God
column18: respect of obey human authority. If our theory be not sufficiently sustained by our reasoning
column19: the historical instances which we have cited will ever stand as stubborn and unanswerable facts.

column1: Religion is the cornerstone of government; its whole fabric rests upon it. It needs not governmental aid
column2: for it is stronger than government itself. Dynasties may pass away
column3: republics and monarchies perish
column4: all other human institutions be destroyed – but religion will last as long as man.

column1: There is no infidelity in our Confederacy. Religion is universal. It binds us together
column2: and makes us one patriotic and moral people. If the pockets of our soldiers slain in battle were searched
column3: prayer books and hymn books would often be found; in none free-love epistles.”

column1: https://beforeitsnews.com/politics/2020/06/southern-history-series-george-fitzhugh-on-religion-and-philosophy-3199979.html/Southern History Series: George Fitzhugh on Religion and Philosophy/"
I know these times are dark
column2: but I firmly believe that our best days still lie ahead. If we come together as one America
column3: there’s nothing that we can’t accomplish. — Joe Biden (@JoeBiden) June 27

column1: After reading Colin Woodard’s new book Union and listening to the various interviews he is doing about the need for a national story to ground a revitalized vision of American civic nationalism
column2: I decided to reread George Fitzhugh who disagreed with him on every point:

column1: “We have not a solitary example in all of history to countenance the theories of our ancestors
column2: that a people may be moral
column3: or that government can exist where religion is not in some form or degree recognized by law. What latitude shall be allowed to men in the exercise and practice of religion
column4: is a question for the people to determine when the occasion requires it. It is best not to lay down abstract principles to guide us in advance. Of all the applications of philosophy none have failed so signally as when it has been tried in matters of government. Philosophy will blow up any government that is founded on it. Religion
column5: on the other hand
column6: will sustain the governments that rest upon it. The French build governments on a priori doctrines of philosophy which explode as fast as built. The English gradually and experimentally form institutions
column7: watch their operation
column8: and deduce general laws from those operations.

column1: That kind of philosophy
column2: which neither attempts to create nor account for
column3: is admissible and useful. An extensive knowledge of the history of the various moral philosophies that have succeeded each other in the world
column4: is useful
column5: but only useful because it warns us to avoid all philosophy in the practical affairs of life. If we would have our people moral
column6: and our institutions permanent
column7: we should gradually repudiate our political abstractions and adopt religious truths in their stead.

column1: It is an unpopular theme to deny human progress and human improvement. We flatter ourselves that we are more enlightened as well as more moral than the ancients
column2: yet we imitate them in all save the mechanic arts. …

column1: Divest us of our Christian morality
column2: and leave us to our moral philosophy
column3: and we might dread the comparison with any era of the past. We have but one moral code
column4: and that a selfish one; the ancients always had two
column5: one of which was elevated
column6: self-denying and unselfish. …

column1: Now explore all the secrets of human hearts
column2: all the recesses of history
column3: and it will be found that religion is as much a matter of consciousness and involuntary belief as free agency or self existence. It is a stubborn fact in human nature. Statesmen cannot ignore its existence
column4: and must provide for its exercise and enjoyment
column5: else their institutions will vanish like chaff before the wind.”

column2: the Court held; rather

column1: % of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.

“The immunity of a state from suit has long been held not to extend to actions against state officials for damages arising out of willful and negligent disregard of state laws.165 The reach of the rule is evident in Scheuer v. Rhodes
column2: 166 in which the Court held that plaintiffs were not barred by the Eleventh Amendment or other immunity doctrines from suing the governor and other officials of a state alleging that they deprived plaintiffs of federal rights under color of state law and seeking damages
column3: when it was clear that plaintiffs were seeking to impose individual and personal liability on the officials. There was no “executive immunity” from suit
column4: the Court held; rather
column5: the immunity of state officials is qualified and varies according to the scope of discretion and responsibilities of the particular office and the circumstances existing at the time the challenged action was taken.”

“BERKELEY
column2: Calif. – The family of a Cal student is searching for answers after learning he had been shot and killed. 19-year-old Seth Smith was set to graduate from U.C. Berkeley next year. Loved ones of Smith describe the Sacramento-area native as brilliant and smart. He started Berkeley as a sophomore double majoring in history and economics. He had dreams to further his studies at the London School of Economics. … “Somebody literally walked up to him and put a gun to the back of his head and shot him and we don’t know why
column3: ” said Smith. Someone walking their dog found him bleeding around 11:15 p.m. He had been shot once. Neighbors said the shooting happened in front of a bus stop …”

coronavirus quarantine
Duties
Summary
This Direct Hire recruitment is to fill positions based on a critical hiring need resulting from the outbreak and spread of the “Coronavirus Disease 2019” (COVID-19)
column2: which has caused a public health emergency. As such
column3: all applicants who meet the OPM Public Health Advisor (Quarantine Program) Series requirements and the minimum specialized experience qualifications stated in this announcement will be referred to hiring managers for further consideration.

column1: CDC is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
Responsibilities
As a Public Health Advisor (Quarantine Program)
column2: you will:

column1: Assist in planning and implementing a program for preventing the importation of communicable diseases from abroad and spread of these diseases domestically.
Provide basic technical assistance on routine
column2: non-controversial projects or activities that are covered by precedent
column3: established policy or accepted practice.

column1: Monitor disease trends and consults with senior leaders to ensure that appropriate measures are taken to prevent the introduction/spread of communicable diseases by travelers
column2: etiologic agents or vectors.

column1: Prepare reports and other substantive program documentation for use in assessing and evaluating program operations.
Perform other duties as assigned.
Travel Required
Occasional travel – You may be expected to travel for this position.
Supervisory status
No
Promotion Potential
Requirements
Conditions of Employment
US Citizenship is required.
E-Verify: If you are selected for this position
column2: the documentation that you present for purposes of completing the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Form I-9 will be verified through the DHS “E-Verify” System. Federal law requires DHS to use the E-Verify System to verify employment eligibility of all new hires
column3: and as a condition of continued employment obligates the new hire to take affirmative steps to resolve any discrepancies identified by the system. The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services is an E-Verify Participant.

column1: Direct Deposit: All Federal employees are required to have Federal salary payments made by direct deposit to a financial institution of their choosing.
All qualification requirements must be met by the closing date of the announcement.
One-year probationary period may be required.
This position can be filled at any grade level.
This position may be subject to a Collective Bargaining Agreement.

This position may be subject toa OGE Financial Disclosure CDC Financial Disclosure-The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention inspires public confidence in its trust responsibilities and mission by maintaining high ethical principles. This position is subject to the confidential financial disclosure requirements of the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 (P.L. 95-521). Therefore
column2: if selected
column3: you will be required to complete a Confidential Financial Disclosure Report (OGE Form 450) to determine if a conflict or an appearance of a conflict exists between your financial interest and your prospective position with the agency. This Information will be required annually.

column1: This position may require a Drug Test and subject to Random Drug Testing.

Yes

column1: Research position: No

Term appointments may be shortened or extended up to a maximum of four years based on the needs of the agency without further competition. Subsequent employment for CDC positions must be through the appropriate competitive process or special employment program hiring authorities.
MINIMUM QUALS:

GS-09: Applicants must have at least one year of specialized experience equivalent to at least the GS-07 grade level in the Federal service to include experience in assisting with providing advice and evaluating the effectiveness of public health programs
column2: policies and activities. OR have a master’s or equivalent graduate degree or 2 full years of progressively higher level graduate education leading to such a degree or LL.B. or J.D.
column3: if related. OR have a combination of experience and education that meets 100% of the qualification requirements for this position.

These positions are subject to temporary assignment at any location in the United States and its territories or possessions

column3: or at sea.

column3: the immunity of state officials is qualified"/"#QAnon posting on/qresearch/ 06/26/20..There was no “executive immunity” from suit
column4: the Court held; rather
column5: the immunity of state officials is qualified

column1: % of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.

“The immunity of a state from suit has long been held not to extend to actions against state officials for damages arising out of willful and negligent disregard of state laws.165 The reach of the rule is evident in Scheuer v. Rhodes
column2: 166 in which the Court held that plaintiffs were not barred by the Eleventh Amendment or other immunity doctrines from suing the governor and other officials of a state alleging that they deprived plaintiffs of federal rights under color of state law and seeking damages
column3: when it was clear that plaintiffs were seeking to impose individual and personal liability on the officials. There was no “executive immunity” from suit
column4: the Court held; rather
column5: the immunity of state officials is qualified and varies according to the scope of discretion and responsibilities of the particular office and the circumstances existing at the time the challenged action was taken.”

column1: https://beforeitsnews.com/politics/2020/06/qanon-posting-onqresearch-062620-there-was-no-executive-immunity-from-suit-the-court-held-rather-the-immunity-of-state-officials-is-qualified-3199897.html#comment-350075/"#QAnon posting on/qresearch/ 06/26/20..There was no “executive immunity” from suit
column2: the Court held; rather
column3: the immunity of state officials is qualified"/"#QAnon posting on/qresearch/ 06/26/20..There was no “executive immunity” from suit
column4: the Court held; rather
column5: the immunity of state officials is qualified

column1: % of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.

“The immunity of a state from suit has long been held not to extend to actions against state officials for damages arising out of willful and negligent disregard of state laws.165 The reach of the rule is evident in Scheuer v. Rhodes
column2: 166 in which the Court held that plaintiffs were not barred by the Eleventh Amendment or other immunity doctrines from suing the governor and other officials of a state alleging that they deprived plaintiffs of federal rights under color of state law and seeking damages
column3: when it was clear that plaintiffs were seeking to impose individual and personal liability on the officials. There was no “executive immunity” from suit
column4: the Court held; rather
column5: the immunity of state officials is qualified and varies according to the scope of discretion and responsibilities of the particular office and the circumstances existing at the time the challenged action was taken.”

column1: Would a jury of peers agree their actions were negligent?
